items.name: 12.04 Harewood Food & Drink Project
items.summary: Evolution Of Tradition // Green Hop IPA
items.desc:
5.9% ABV // 1.061 OG // 7 EBC // 25 IBU // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), WHEAT (GLUTEN), OATS (GLUTEN), Hops, Yeast
Helping at Harewood House Estate’s annual September hop harvest is always a highlight of the monk calendar, and this third year brought with it our biggest band of volunteers yet. We gathered as many cones as we could to be rushed back to the Old Flax Store to create this green hopped IPA.
Brewing with fresh hops is not an easy task! Using the cones before they are dried means 9 times the volume is required to account for the mass of water they hold.
We repurposed the mash tun as a hopback, allowing us to squeeze in around 90kg of cones before filling the vessel with post-boil wort to wash through and pick up the unique floral, herbal character that they impart.
The wort itself was made from a grist packed with white wheat, chit malt, and some naked oats for a full-bodied and silky base. We fermented with a Kveik strain for pronounced stone fruit esters before dry hopping with a combination
of UK Olicana and US Amarillo to complement the floral notes and bring orange zest and tangerine juice refreshment to the finish.

items.name: 24.03 Tom J Newell
items.summary: Ghost Venom // Young Master // Imperial Stout // Red Wine Barrel Aged
items.desc:
12% ABV // 1.120 OG // 100 EBC // 15 IBU // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), OATS (GLUTEN), RYE (GLUTEN), Hops, Yeast
This third release in the Tom Newell series was originally brewed back in February, when jess and tom from young master brewery, Hong Kong, stopped by on their UK tour.
Young Master are at the forefront of craft brewing in Southeast Asia and carry a reputation for outstanding barrel-aged releases, so it was a no-brainer to work with them on something decadent.
For the base beer, we put together an adjunct- free, rich, and viscous imperial stout which puts the spotlight on the flavours of the malt. Starting with an English ale barley malt, we added Munich malt and flaked oats to build in the body and extra mouthfeel, and then selected a range of roasted grains, including chocolate rye, to achieve a deep, dark colour, plenty of dark chocolate and light roast coffee notes, and an extra touch of earthy spice. Finished off with some crystal rye plus medium and dark crystal barley malts for dark fruit and cinder toffee touches, we had a wonderfully complex stout on our hands, which after a month of fermentation and conditioning, was transferred to a selection of freshly emptied French Burgundy and Pinot Noir barrels for six months, to pick up the rich red grape, light oak and red cherry flavours they held.

items.name: 27.01 British Culture Archive
items.summary: Holidays In The Sun // DDH Double IPA
items.desc:
8.7% ABV // 1.082 OG // 7 EBC // 20 IBU // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), WHEAT (GLUTEN), OATS (GLUTEN), Dextrose, Hops, Yeast
This DIPA forms the first in a new patrons series in collaboration with the British Culture Archive. The series will be IPA focused, but also intended to showcase some of the progression in the UK hops over the past few years, pairing them with a US variety to show that homegrown varieties can deliver on many of the big, citrus flavours we love from the pacific northwest.
First up we’ve selected Olicana, a variety which has been around for a few years now and still is up there amongst the forefront of UK hops. Olicana stands out for its impressive aromas of mango and passion fruit, backed up by nectarine and apricot notes, and a pleasant floral character. We paired this with one of our current favourite US varieties in Idaho 7, a real allrounder that can be relied upon for plenty of ripe tropical fruit of its own whether used hot side or in the dry hop. In this case, we went with both, as we loaded the whirlpool of this oat-filled NE DIPA with Idaho 7 before drying hopping with both varieties to a combined total of 26g/l.

items.name: 28.01 Leimai Lemaow
items.summary: Astro Gary // Rainbow Astro Belt Sour IPA
items.desc:
6.5% ABV // 1.0735 OG // 6 EBC // 15 IBU // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), OATS (GLUTEN), LACTOSE (MILK), Mango Puree, Raspberry Puree, Orange Juice Concentrate, Lime Juice Concentrate, Hops, Yeast
FOR THIS NEW PATRONS PROJECT SERIES WITH LEIMAI LEMAOW, WE’RE GOING
TO BE TAKING A TRIP TO THE SWEET SIDE. LEIMAI IS A SELF-PROCLAIMED CANDY NUT, SO WE’LL BE TAKING OUR INSPIRATION FOR THE SERIES FROM HER PERSONAL FAVOURITE SWEETS, TO CREATE TASTES OF CHILDHOOD IN LIQUID FORM.
First up, a sour IPA inspired by the colours and flavours of rainbow Astro Belts. We started with a simple hazy IPA base of pale barley malt and plenty of oats, backed up with lactose to round out the mouthfeel. We whirlpool hopped with Citra BBC and then fermented with our house IPA yeast strain.
We selected fruits to represent the colours of the candy that we felt worked well together. Leading with the ripe fruit flavours of mango puree and orange juice, we followed up with plenty of tangy raspberry puree, and finally, a touch of zingy lime juice to give a sour accent to the finish.

items.name: Alpha Delta
items.desc:
7.0% ABV // 440ML
ALPHA DELTA's take on a North East legend. Bold and punchy, hopped up with Citra, Amarillo, and Cascade.

items.name: Bombay Dazzler
items.desc:
4.8% // 330ML
Our take on the classic Belgian witbier riffs on the style's characteristic spice profile and takes it all the way back to the motherland of spices.

items.name: Enter The Haze
items.desc:
The humble IPA has been on an incredible journey. With it’s origins in England the style quickly took over the world. Initial American attempts to re-create this classic British style with big, bold US hops led the first West Coast IPA’s, over the last decade we’ve seen the style evolve again. Here we combine higher dry hopping with a water profile and yeast that gives stone and tropical fruit flavor and a hazier appearance to the beer. This is one of our favourite styles of beer and we’re proud to have championed it over the years.
Cases contain:
4 x FAITH
4 X STRIDING EDGE
4 X HEATHEN
All for £32!

items.name: Eternal
items.desc:
4.1% ABV // 11.00 EBC // 45 IBU // 1.05 OG // 330ML
INGREDIENTS: WATER, Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), HOPS, YEAST
A product brewed for almost 7,000 years, a quest for perfection that never ends. Citrusy, light and refreshing. To Eternity.
SUITABLE FOR VEGANS

items.name: Faith
items.desc:
ABV: 5.4% ABV // 6.00 EBC // 30 IBU // 1.04 OG // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: WATER, Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), WHEAT (GLUTEN) OATS (GLUTEN), HOPS, YEAST
A Hazy Pale Ale packed with soft fruit flavours. Smooth, tropical and juicy. You’ve got to have Faith.
SUITABLE FOR VEGANS

items.name: Great Northern Lager
items.desc:
ABV: 4.3% ABV // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: Water, Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), WHEAT (GLUTEN), Hops, Yeast
We love our big juicy IPAs and impy stouts, however, sometimes what you want is simplicity. We’ve been brewing lagers in Patrons and at our Refectory for a while now.
We’ve taken everything we have learned, continuing to tweak the recipes until we were confident of brewing a really good lager, coming in at a sessionable 4.3%. Bamsberg pilsner malt and Saaz hops bring a distinct clean character to this pilsner-style lager, with additions of wheat rounding out the mouthfeel.

items.name: Heathen
items.desc:
ABV: 7.2% ABV // 11.00 EBC // 30 IBU // 1.04 OG // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: WATER, Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), WHEAT, OATS (GLUTEN), HOPS, YEAST
A bold yet balanced New England IPA. Soft, resinous and tropical. For the Heathens.
SUITABLE FOR VEGANS

items.name: Keep The Faith
items.desc:
ABV: 5.4% ABV // 6.00 EBC // 30 IBU // 1.04 OG // 330ML
INGREDIENTS: WATER, Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), WHEAT (GLUTEN) OATS (GLUTEN), HOPS, YEAST
A Modern Pale Ale packed with soft fruit flavours. Smooth, tropical and juicy. You’ve got to have Faith.
Every Keep The Faith 24 pack sold includes a £3 donation for our For The North Foundation grant fund. The Foundation looks to offer £5000 grants to support vital community projects and causes in the North. Every 3 months, we advocate a different social cause. Currently, we are championing awareness of the LGBTQ+ community in the North, and this grant fund will go towards supporting projects and organisations that help this community.
SUITABLE FOR VEGANS

items.name: New World IPA
items.desc:
ABV: 6.2% ABV // 14.00 EBC // 60 IBU // 1.06 OG // 330ML
INGREDIENTS: WATER, Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), HOPS, YEAST
The first hops from the new world arrived on UK shores in the 1800’s. Packed with a new world of flavour. Citrus, zest and pine. This is our tribute.
SUITABLE FOR VEGANS

items.name: Northern Heroes
items.desc:
These are go-to’s. If you were stranded on a desert Island and could only choose three beers. These would be ours. You open a pub and are only allowed three beers on draft. These are the ones. You’re having the ultimate barbecue, you open the lid of your cooler to find three beers amongst the ice… You get the idea.
Each case contains:
4 x FAITH 330ml
4 X ETERNAL 330ml
4 X NEW WORLD 330ml
All for £25.50!

items.name: Ofs014
items.desc:
5.4% ABV // 1.061 OG // 6 EBC // 18 IBU // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: Water, Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), Malted WHEAT (GLUTEN), OATS (GLUTEN), Rice, Hops, Yeast, LACTOSE (MILK), Vanilla, Matcha
A clean crisp Rice lager building off the recipe for OFS009 but with a twist inspired by our brewer Adam’s trip to Japan last year where he tried matcha Ice cream for the first time. The Matcha brings its iconic lemon-lime and a light bitter herbal vibe to this recipe with some Lactose and vanilla used to round out the base to give a sweeter finish.
----
In 2014 we opened the doors to the Old Flax Store, a Grade II listed building that we found and renovated into the home of Northern Monk.
We grew significantly in the years to follow, but the Old Flax Store remains the heart of the operation. If you’ve ever visited us here, you’ll know that you can look through the ground floor window to see our original tanks still in operation. This is where we brew our smaller, more limited releases.
2020 marks the year that we launch a brand-new beer series, a series dedicated to the exploratory, small-batch nature of brewing at OFS. We’ve released beers exclusive to the Old Flax Store before, but we’ve given this series a whole new identity.
The Old Flax Store Special series will push the boundaries of our brewing, allowing us to be completely experimental in approach. Since these beers will be limited in quantity, we’ve restricted can sales to two per person, to ensure that as many people as possible have the opportunity to try them.
We don’t expect these beers to hang around for long, so be quick if a release catches your eye. Follow our social media channels to make sure that you don’t miss out on a launch.

items.name: Ofs016
items.desc:
8.7% ABV // 1.080 OG // 10 EBC // 40 IBU // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: Water, Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), Malted WHEAT (GLUTEN), OATS (GLUTEN), Malted RYE (GLUTEN), Hops, Yeast
Inspired by the latest advances in hop delivery in the form of Incognito, we decided to see what it could do in an old school West Coast Double IPA. The Incognito allowed us to hot side hop at the equivalent of 10g/l, packing the liquid with silky, resinous hop oils. We then dry hopped with Simcoe, Ekuanot and Mosaic which bring citrus, herbal and piney notes before a long yet smooth bitterness.

items.name: Ofs017
items.desc:
6.0% ABV // 1.060 OG // 8 EBC // 10 IBU // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: Water, Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), Malted WHEAT (GLUTEN), OATS (GLUTEN), Hops, Yeast,
This easy-drinking 6% IPA combines the intense pineapple and coconut notes of Sabro Incognito with the fresh tropical juice punch of the Australian variety Galaxy. Silky smooth and packed with a cocktail of exotic fruit flavours.
----
In 2014 we opened the doors to the Old Flax Store, a Grade II listed building that we found and renovated into the home of Northern Monk.
We grew significantly in the years to follow, but the Old Flax Store remains the heart of the operation. If you’ve ever visited us here, you’ll know that you can look through the ground floor window to see our original tanks still in operation. This is where we brew our smaller, more limited releases.
2020 marks the year that we launch a brand-new beer series, a series dedicated to the exploratory, small-batch nature of brewing at OFS. We’ve released beers exclusive to the Old Flax Store before, but we’ve given this series a whole new identity.
The Old Flax Store Special series will push the boundaries of our brewing, allowing us to be completely experimental in approach. Since these beers will be limited in quantity, we’ve restricted can sales to two per person, to ensure that as many people as possible have the opportunity to try them.
We don’t expect these beers to hang around for long, so be quick if a release catches your eye. Follow our social media channels to make sure that you don’t miss out on a launch.
Default Title - £3.49 GBP

items.name: Origin
items.desc:
ABV: 5.7% ABV // 11.00 EBC // 45 IBU // 1.05 OG // 330ML
INGREDIENTS: WATER, MALTED BARLEY, HOPS, YEAST
(A GLUTED FREE PRODUCT)
A homage to the origins of IPA and the evolution of this style. Piney, juicy and crisp, Gluten-free and Vegan. The evolution of tradition.
SUITABLE FOR VEGANS

items.name: Patrons Society Exclusive
items.summary: Special Agent Smith // Blueberry Pancake Black IPA
items.desc:
ABV: 8.5% ABV
At the request of Agent Smith, we bring you a Black IPA, concealing within it all the deliciousness of American-style blueberry pancakes. Over a base rounded out with oats and coloured with de-husked dark malts in the mash and on top through the sparge, we fermented with our house IPA strain and infused the beer with 80g/l of pureed blueberries, as well as a dash of rich maple syrup, before enhancing all the berry fruitiness and stone fruit esters of the yeast with a generous Mosaic dry hop.

items.name: Pentrich
items.summary: Double Dry Hopped Dream Tempo // Imperial IPA
items.desc:
8.3% ABV
A special double dry hopped version of one of Pentrich’s recent favourites - where Citra is the star of the show. Huge citrus fruit aromas crawl out of the can upon opening; with masses of intense grapefruit & juicy stone fruit flavours hitting upon the first taste, and notes of dank pine and a firm bitterness on the finish.

items.name: Pentrich Brewing
items.desc:
7.2% ABV
A super hazy IPA packed full of three of Pentrich’s favourite hops. The Ekuanot adds layers of juicy tropical flavours alongside the punchy citrus notes from the Citra. Columbus supplies notes of resinous pine which, alongside the moderate bitterness, rounds out the fruity flavours.

items.name: Pipeline Brewing
items.desc:
6.0% ABV // 440ML
A smooth easy drinking IPA with passionfruit and watermelon on the nose. Flavour is fresh and clean with a vibrant melon feel, Fresh cut grass, and pine on the finish.

items.name: Striding Edge Hazy Light IPA
items.desc:
ABV 2.8% // 6.00 EBC // 40 IBU // 1.037 OG // 440ML
INGREDIENTS: WATER, Malted BARLEY (GLUTEN), OATS (GLUTEN), HOPS, YEAST
A Light IPA inspired by one of the North’s highest peaks. Piney, citrusy and fresh. For the believers.
SUITABLE FOR VEGANS
